Articles.Content:
I thought I'd share this for posterity. I know that it'll be fixed at some point but it was silly. Basically, it wiggles out of the ground (atmosphere) like you'd expect and once it timewarps in space, it wiggles like mad, without any input or thrust. Good show. And it continues on its journey after breaking apart without any thrust ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1eQkKXgtfZyRTRFWnFxU3c3T3c/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1eQkKXgtfZyRTRFWnFxU3c3T3c/view?usp=sharing)

Would you mind posting an image? I'm curious to see how it looks like.

Oh, and welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
